void.string:
Game Levels for Boulder Dash Clone
The file format is as follows: Space seperated columns, one row per line.
- Outer wall = Brick D Dirt J Jem (The Diamond) B Boulder R Rockford * Empty Square X Enemy E Exit
-------------------------------------------
Edit the level by changing the width, length, and MapLayout.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - B B J B B * B B J B B D = B D B B B - - B = D B J B B B = B B D D B B B = B - - B J B B B = B B * B J B B = B B * B - - J B B = = B B D * B = B B B B B B B - - J B J B B J J B B B * B B J B B B B - - B B B = B B B J = = B J B J B = = B - - J B B * B D J B * J B B B J J B * = - - B = B B B D B J B B J B B B = J D D - - B * B J B D J B B B B J D D * B = * - - J B D D J * B J = B = J D D B B B J - - J D * = B D J B * B * D * B B B J E - - J B B J B D B = J = * J B B J B B * - - D J D = B D J * B * B B = B B J D B - - * B * B D B B J J B D B * D = B * J - - B B B J D B B B D B = = B B * B D B - - B B J B J = B J B J B D J B D = B B - - B J D D B * B B J B J B D B B B J B - - R J B J J B J B B B J B J B = B B B - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
